name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Cloud Support Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to deliver high-performance solutions. Proficient in implementing **IAM**, **RBAC**, and **data governance** to ensure robust security and compliance with industry standards. Skilled in managing **encryption**, **data privacy**, and maintaining **data quality monitoring** to preserve data integrity.

Expert in **Python**, **Java**, and **NodeJS**, effectively leveraging these programming languages to optimize backend processes and support data replication efforts. Experienced in network protocols such as **TCP/IP**, **HTTP**, **HTTPS**, and **DNS** to troubleshoot and resolve connectivity issues. Well-versed in using diagnostic tools and **load balancers** to enhance system reliability and performance, alongside implementing **firewalls** for enhanced security.

With a strong foundation in **machine learning** processes, I am adept at developing and serving ML models, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, alongside my full stack experience in frameworks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. My commitment to continuous improvement is reflected in my capability to communicate effectively with cross-functional teams to enhance user experience and operational efficiency.

• Architected cloud-native solutions leveraging **Python** and **Node.js**, ensuring seamless **data integration** with backend services using RESTful APIs.

• Delivered detailed documentation and training sessions on cloud support processes, enhancing team knowledge and support efficiency.
• Utilized analytical tools to facilitate real-time monitoring and reporting of cloud service performance metrics, driving improvements in service delivery.

• Managed data governance and ensured data quality monitoring across services by implementing **Snowflake** and **AWS** solutions
• Oversaw identity access management (IAM), role-based access control (RBAC), and data encryption, enhancing security protocols in multi-cloud environments, specifically using **Azure** and **GCP**
• Developed robust SQL queries for **data replication** and performed diagnostics to ensure high availability and performance across applications
• Collaborated on implementing multi-factor authentication (MFA), **Public Key Infrastructure (PKI)**, and **SAML** for secure access management within cloud platforms
• Built resilient data pipelines and integrated command-line tools working with **Python**, ensuring seamless data flow and operational efficiency in cloud infrastructure
• Provided support and troubleshooting expertise for environments using **Java** and **NodeJS**, improving system stability and user experience
• Enhanced incident response protocols by leveraging TCP/IP, HTTP, and HTTPS for secure communications, resulting in a **30% reduction** in response time
• Employed diagnostic tools for real-time monitoring, contributing to a **50% improvement** in system uptime through proactive management strategies
• Developed comprehensive documentation for operational processes, incorporating data lineage to enhance transparency and compliance within cloud operations
• Maintained high levels of communication skills within cross-functional teams to ensure alignment and clarity in project objectives and outcomes.

Leveraged **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to manage cloud infrastructure, ensuring high availability and quick recovery for e-commerce applications across **9** global data centers.
Designed and implemented robust **IAM** policies and role-based access control (**RBAC**), ensuring secure and compliant user authentication and data governance policies for over **1000** active users.
Utilized **Python** and **Node.js** to construct microservices architecture, facilitating seamless data flow and integration with cloud services like **Snowflake** for analytics and reporting, improving data-driven decision-making processes by **30%**.
Conducted performance tuning and optimization of application protocols such as **TCP/IP**, **HTTP**, and **HTTPS** to enhance security and user response times by **25%**, achieving faster data retrieval from databases.
Implemented data privacy measures, encryption protocols, and secure communications using **Public Key Infrastructure (PKI)**, **SAML**, and **SCIM** to protect sensitive user information and ensure compliance with GDPR standards.
Established monitoring and logging systems using **diagnostic tools**, providing real-time insights and proactive management of application performance, reducing downtime by **15%**.
Coordinated data replication strategies and quality monitoring to ensure data integrity and lineage, enabling accurate reporting on cloud-hosted solutions, which improved operational transparency significantly.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to facilitate problem-solving and enhance service documentation, leveraging strong communication skills to maintain clear team interaction.
Ensured proper firewall configurations and load balancer setups, guaranteeing resilient service delivery with a maximum system uptime of **99.9%**.
